nodes.long_description:
# 3DtoMeへようこそ – 空間コンピューティングへのポータル
**3DtoMe** は、**3Dモデルのアップロード、表示、操作、探索**をかつてないほど直感的に行える強力なマルチプラットフォームアプリです。物理的な体験とデジタル体験を融合させ、**Meta Quest、Apple Vision Pro、デスクトップ、Web** に対応し、1つのアカウントで利用可能です。

**主な機能:**
- **スケール、回転、ズーム**で3Dモデルを自在に操作
- モデル内に入り**内部を探索**
- **爆発図表示**で各パーツを詳細に確認
- 空間全体を感じる**没入型背景**
- **個人の3Dモデル**（glbファイル）のアップロードに対応

**建築、デザイン、製造、教育、営業、マーケティング**に最適で、空間内での**アイデアの可視化とプレゼンテーション**をサポートします。

**近日登場:**
- **Spatial Drawing**：3D空間で直接スケッチ
- **Spatial Collaboration**：リアルタイムの共同体験を共有

3DtoMe は単なるビューアではなく、次世代の **3Dコンテンツ体験**のための**拡張性と相互運用性に優れたプラットフォーム**です。1つのアカウントで、デバイスや環境、ユースケースを自由に切り替え可能。

**相互運用性の未来**を体験しよう。3Dで可視化しよう。すべてのデバイスでコラボレーション。**3DtoMeへようこそ。**
nodes.short_description: 3DtoMeは、3Dモデルを没入型の環境で表示、拡大縮小、回転、探索、分解することができます。自分のモデルをアップロードするか、サンプルをお試しください。Web、デスクトップ、スマートフォン、Apple Vision Pro、Meta Questに対応し、1つのアカウントですべてを管理できます。建築、工業デザイン、教育、マーケティング、製造、デジタルツインに最適です。

nodes.long_description:
# Willkommen bei 3DtoMe – Dein Portal zum Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** ist eine leistungsstarke und intuitive plattformübergreifende App, mit der du **3D-Modelle hochladen, anzeigen, bearbeiten und erkunden** kannst – wie nie zuvor. Sie verbindet physische und digitale Erfahrungen und funktioniert auf **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, Desktop und Web** – alles mit einem einzigen Konto.

**Hauptfunktionen:**
- **Skalieren, rotieren und zoomen** von 3D-Modellen
- Betritt deine Modelle und **erkunde sie von innen**
- **Explosionsansicht** für detaillierte Analyse
- **Immersive Hintergründe** für vollständigen räumlichen Kontext
- **Hochladen persönlicher Modelle** aus deiner Bibliothek (glb-Dateien)

Entwickelt für **Architektur, Design, Fertigung, Bildung, Vertrieb und Marketing**, verbessert 3DtoMe deine Fähigkeit, Ideen **räumlich zu visualisieren und zu präsentieren**.

**Demnächst verfügbar:**
- **Spatial Drawing** zum Zeichnen direkt im 3D-Raum
- **Spatial Collaboration** für gemeinsame immersive Echtzeit-Sitzungen

3DtoMe ist nicht nur ein Viewer, sondern eine **skalierbare, interoperable Plattform** für die nächste Generation der 3D-Inhalte. Wechsle nahtlos zwischen Geräten, Umgebungen und Anwendungen – mit einem einzigen Konto und einem effizienten Workflow.

Erlebe die **Zukunft der Interoperabilität**. Visualisiere in 3D. Arbeite plattformübergreifend. **Willkommen bei 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description: Mit 3DtoMe kannst du deine 3D-Modelle in einer immersiven Umgebung anzeigen, skalieren, drehen, erkunden und aufteilen. Lade eigene Modelle hoch oder sieh dir unsere Beispiele an. Die plattformübergreifende App funktioniert auf Web, Desktop, Smartphones, Apple Vision Pro und Meta Quest – mit nur einem Konto. Ideal für Architektur, Industriedesign, Bildung, Marketing, Produktion und digitale Zwillinge.

nodes.long_description:
# Bienvenido a 3DtoMe – Tu portal hacia el Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** es una aplicación multiplataforma potente e intuitiva que te permite **cargar, visualizar, manipular y explorar modelos 3D** como nunca antes. Diseñada para unir experiencias físicas y digitales, funciona en **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, escritorio y web**, todo con una sola cuenta.

**Características clave:**
- **Escala, rota y amplía** tus modelos 3D
- Entra y **explora los modelos desde el interior**
- **Vista explosionada** para inspección pieza por pieza
- **Fondos inmersivos** para contexto espacial completo
- **Carga de modelos personales** desde tu biblioteca (archivos glb)

Pensada para **arquitectura, diseño, fabricación, educación, ventas y marketing**, 3DtoMe mejora tu capacidad de **visualizar y presentar** ideas en un entorno espacial.

**Próximamente:**
- **Spatial Drawing** para dibujar directamente en el espacio 3D
- **Spatial Collaboration** para compartir sesiones inmersivas en tiempo real

3DtoMe no es solo un visor, es una plataforma **interoperable y escalable** diseñada para la interacción de contenidos 3D de próxima generación. Cambia sin interrupciones entre dispositivos, entornos y usos con una sola cuenta y un flujo de trabajo potente.

Vive el **futuro de la interoperabilidad**. Visualiza en 3D. Trabaja en todas las plataformas. **Bienvenido a 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description: 3DtoMe te permite ver, escalar, rotar, explorar y descomponer tus modelos 3D en un entorno inmersivo. Sube tus modelos o explora nuestros ejemplos. Esta app multiplataforma funciona en la web, escritorio, móviles, Apple Vision Pro y Meta Quest, todo con una sola cuenta. Ideal para arquitectura, diseño industrial, educación, marketing, manufactura y gemelos digitales.

nodes.long_description:
# Benvenuto in 3DtoMe – Il tuo portale nello Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** è un'app multipiattaforma potente e intuitiva che ti consente di **caricare, visualizzare, manipolare ed esplorare modelli 3D** come mai prima d'ora. Progettata per unire esperienze fisiche e digitali, funziona su **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, desktop e web**, tutto con un unico account.

**Funzionalità principali:**
- **Scala, ruota e ingrandisci** i tuoi modelli 3D
- Entra ed **esplora i modelli dall'interno**
- **Vista esplosa** per analisi parte per parte
- **Sfondo immersivo** per un contesto spaziale completo
- **Caricamento di modelli personali** dalla tua libreria (file glb)

Pensata per **architettura, design, produzione, educazione, vendite e marketing**, 3DtoMe potenzia la tua capacità di **visualizzare e presentare** idee in un ambiente spaziale.

**Prossimamente:**
- **Spatial Drawing** per disegnare direttamente nello spazio 3D
- **Spatial Collaboration** per condividere sessioni immersive in tempo reale

3DtoMe non è solo un visualizzatore, è una piattaforma **scalabile e interoperabile**, progettata per l’interazione di contenuti 3D di nuova generazione. Passa senza interruzioni tra dispositivi, ambienti e casi d’uso con un solo account e un flusso di lavoro potente.

Vivi il **futuro dell’interoperabilità**. Visualizza in 3D. Lavora su tutte le piattaforme. **Benvenuto in 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description: 3DtoMe ti permette di visualizzare, scalare, ruotare, esplorare ed esplodere i tuoi modelli 3D in un ambiente immersivo. Carica i tuoi modelli o scopri i nostri esempi. L'app multipiattaforma funziona su web, desktop, smartphone, Apple Vision Pro e Meta Quest, tutto con un solo account. Ideale per architettura, design industriale, educazione, marketing, produzione e digital twin.

nodes.long_description:
# 欢迎使用 3DtoMe – 您通往空间计算的门户
**3DtoMe** 是一款功能强大且直观的跨平台应用程序，可让您以前所未有的方式**上传、查看、操作和探索 3D 模型**。它旨在融合物理与数字体验，适用于 **Meta Quest、Apple Vision Pro、桌面和网页端**，只需一个账户即可访问。

**主要功能包括：**
- **缩放、旋转和查看**您的 3D 模型
- 进入并**从内部探索模型**
- **爆炸视图**，便于逐个零件分析
- **沉浸式背景**，提供完整的空间上下文
- **上传个人模型**（glb 文件）到您的资料库

3DtoMe 适用于**建筑、设计、制造、教育、销售与市场营销**，增强您在空间环境中**可视化与展示**创意的能力。

**即将推出：**
- **Spatial Drawing**：在 3D 空间中直接绘制
- **Spatial Collaboration**：实时共享沉浸式协作会话

3DtoMe 不仅仅是一个查看器，它是一个面向下一代 **3D 内容交互**的**可扩展、可互操作平台**。只需一个账户，即可无缝切换设备、环境和使用场景。

体验**互操作性的未来**。以 3D 方式可视化。在各个平台协同工作。**欢迎使用 3DtoMe。**
nodes.short_description: 3DtoMe 让您在沉浸式环境中查看、缩放、旋转、探索和分解您的 3D 模型。上传您自己的模型或查看我们的示例。此跨平台应用适用于网页、桌面、智能手机、Apple Vision Pro 和 Meta Quest，一个账户即可通用。适用于建筑、工业设计、教育、营销、制造和数字孪生工作流程。

nodes.long_description:
# Bem-vindo ao 3DtoMe – Seu portal para o Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** é um aplicativo poderoso e intuitivo que permite **carregar, visualizar, manipular e explorar modelos 3D** como nunca antes. Projetado para unir experiências físicas e digitais, funciona em **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, desktop e web**, tudo com uma única conta.

**Principais recursos:**
- **Escale, gire e aproxime** seus modelos 3D
- Entre e **explore os modelos por dentro**
- **Visualização explodida** para inspeção detalhada
- **Cenários imersivos** para contexto espacial completo
- **Uploads de modelos pessoais** da sua biblioteca (arquivos glb)

Projetado para **arquitetura, design, fabricação, educação, vendas e marketing**, o 3DtoMe aumenta sua capacidade de **visualizar e apresentar** ideias em um ambiente espacial.

**Em breve:**
- **Spatial Drawing** para desenhar diretamente no espaço 3D
- **Spatial Collaboration** para sessões imersivas em tempo real

3DtoMe não é apenas um visualizador — é uma plataforma **interoperável e escalável**, feita para a nova geração de interação com conteúdo 3D. Alterne perfeitamente entre dispositivos, ambientes e casos de uso com uma conta e um fluxo de trabalho poderoso.

Experimente o **futuro da interoperabilidade**. Visualize em 3D. Trabalhe entre plataformas. **Bem-vindo ao 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description: O 3DtoMe permite visualizar, redimensionar, girar, explorar e desmontar modelos 3D em um ambiente imersivo. Carregue seus próprios modelos ou explore nossos exemplos. Este aplicativo multiplataforma funciona na web, desktop, smartphones, Apple Vision Pro e Meta Quest, com uma única conta. Ideal para arquitetura, design industrial, educação, marketing, manufatura e gêmeos digitais.

nodes.long_description:
# Welcome to 3DtoMe – Your Portal into Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** is a powerful and intuitive cross-platform app that lets you **upload, view, manipulate, and explore 3D models** like never before. Designed to merge physical and digital experiences, it works across **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, desktop, and web**, all with a single account.


**Key features include:**
- **Scale, rotate, and zoom** your 3D models
- Enter and **explore models** from the inside
- **Exploded view** for part-by-part inspection
- **Immersive backgrounds** for full spatial context
- **Personal 3D uploads** from your library (glb files).

Built for **architecture, design, manufacturing, education, sales and  marketing,** 3DtoMe enhances your ability to **visualize and present** ideas in a spatial environment.


**Coming soon:**
- **Spatial Drawing** to sketch directly in 3D space
- **Spatial Collaboration** to share real-time immersive sessions

3DtoMe is not just a viewer, it’s a scalable, **interoperable platform** designed for next-generation **3D content interaction**. Switch seamlessly between devices, environments, and use cases with one account and one powerful workflow.

Experience the **future of interoperability**. Visualize in 3D. Work across platforms. **Welcome to 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description:
3DtoMe lets you view, scale, rotate, explore, and explode your 3D models in an immersive environment. 
Upload your own models and dive inside them or see our examples.

This cross-platform app works on web, desktop, smartphones, Apple Vision Pro, and Meta Quest all with one account and with your 3D. 

Ideal for architecture, industrial design, education, marketing, manufacturing, and digital twin workflows. Discover seamless Spatial Computing and product visualization across all your devices.

nodes.long_description:
# Bienvenue sur 3DtoMe – Votre portail vers le Spatial Computing
**3DtoMe** est une application multiplateforme puissante et intuitive qui vous permet de **téléverser, visualiser, manipuler et explorer des modèles 3D** comme jamais auparavant. Conçue pour fusionner expériences physiques et numériques, elle fonctionne sur **Meta Quest, Apple Vision Pro, bureau et web**, le tout avec un seul compte.

**Fonctionnalités principales :**
- **Mise à l’échelle, rotation et zoom** de vos modèles 3D
- Entrez dans vos modèles et **explorez-les de l’intérieur**
- **Vue éclatée** pour une inspection pièce par pièce
- **Arrière-plans immersifs** pour un contexte spatial complet
- **Importation de modèles personnels** depuis votre bibliothèque (fichiers glb)

Conçue pour **l’architecture, le design, l’éducation, la fabrication, la vente et le marketing**, 3DtoMe améliore votre capacité à **visualiser et présenter** des idées dans un environnement spatial.

**À venir :**
- **Spatial Drawing** pour dessiner directement dans l’espace 3D
- **Spatial Collaboration** pour partager des sessions immersives en temps réel

3DtoMe n’est pas un simple visualiseur, c’est une plateforme **interopérable et évolutive**, conçue pour l’interaction de contenus 3D nouvelle génération. Basculez facilement entre appareils, environnements et usages grâce à un seul compte et un flux de travail puissant.

Découvrez le **futur de l’interopérabilité**. Visualisez en 3D. Collaborez dans l’espace. **Bienvenue sur 3DtoMe.**
nodes.short_description: 3DtoMe vous permet de visualiser, redimensionner, faire pivoter, explorer et éclater vos modèles 3D dans un environnement immersif. Téléchargez vos propres modèles ou explorez nos exemples. Cette application multiplateforme fonctionne sur le web, bureau, smartphones, Apple Vision Pro et Meta Quest, avec un seul compte. Idéale pour l'architecture, le design, l'éducation, le marketing, la fabrication et les jumeaux numériques.

nodes.long_description:
3DtoMe transforms 3D modeling by merging digital twins with spatial collaboration on Quest devices.

Break down physical barriers and work seamlessly across teams or departments in a shared 3D space. Co-design, prototype, and present your models in ways that were never possible before,even models captured via photogrammetry directly through the 3DtoMe mobile app.

Step into a fully immersive 3D workspace where you can view, manipulate, and annotate models. Whether you're developing a product, delivering a lesson, or refining a design, 3DtoMe offers a robust set of tools tailored for professionals in engineering, education, manufacturing and sales.

Main Features:
• Intuitive Controls – Use Quest controllers to interact with, manipulate, and annotate 3D models with ease.
• Explode & Explore – Visually separate components to examine each part through guided, animated breakdowns.
• Real-Time Collaboration – Share your workspace with others, exchanging feedback with comments and live annotations.
• Remote Presentations – Present your products through immersive sessions and interactive cards—no shipping or travel required.
• Cross-Platform Access – Work on your projects from Quest headsets, Android devices, Vision Pro, smartphones, tablets, web, and desktops.

3DtoMe is a feature-rich platform. With continuous updates and new capabilities on the way, it’s designed to grow with your creative and professional needs.
nodes.short_description:
3DtoMe brings 3D modeling and collaboration to Quest devices.

View, manipulate and annotate models in an immersive workspace using your controllers. Upload your own 3D models directly from the 3DtoMe mobile app. Co-design, prototype and present across teams in real time. Features include exploded views, interactive presentations, and cross-platform access from VR, mobile, desktop and web.

Built for professionals in design, education and industry—3DtoMe is intuitive and constantly evolving.

nodes.change_log: This version introduces the HDR background display feature associated with models that have it and also contains various optimizations and bug-fixes.
